results.name: a(n) = n*2^n - 2^(n/2)*sin(Pi*n/4).
link: Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (6,-14,16,-8).
formula: Related to binomial transform of A002265. Sequence is identical to its fourth differences (cf. A139756, A137221). See also A097064, A135035, A038504, A135356. - _Paul Curtz_, Jun 18 2008
results.author: _Paul Barry_, Oct 28 2004
